description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Monkey flap around the crocogators! Feast on bananas! Shoot down and poop on every last birdy, vegetarian, and teacher who is foolish enough to eat YOUR bananas. It's like Flappy Bird but with Monkeys and poo! Follow AwesomeBerries for irregularly tweeted free stuff, and 99.3% pure awesome.
